ai-tha-ap358:1.2_0: if they sleep like a sage should beamed;
ai-tha-ap358:2.3_0: given with a clear and confident mind,
ai-tha-ap358:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap358:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap358:3.4_0: this barren field is the fruit.
ai-tha-ap358:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Ambaṭṭha.
ai-tha-ap358:6.1_0: he gave the sixth year to the Elder India (monastery).
